name: Aina

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ACC in Faction Crypts by 40

skills.name: Ferocity
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 10% chance of granting an Extra Turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5

skills.name: Bloody Swath
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 3 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10'

skills.name: Overmaster
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Before attacking, has an 80% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 3 turns. Heals this Champion by 10% of the damage inflicted.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10

seo.description: Barbarians is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 27 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: The Barbarians of Hark'han are opportunists ever eager to offertheir mercenary services to the highest bidder. When theservants of the Corruption first came from the East with theirdragon, they quickly made a pact granting them control of theregion they now patrol as the Deadlands.
